Ball - Class in Unnamed Package
The main pong ball for pong Moves in the vertical and horizontal direction and can reflect its velocity upon collision

Constructs a new Ball object with random size, position, and velocity.

Button - Class in Unnamed Package
A class to represent a selectable button within the game environment allowing for the triggering of specific actions or events when selected by the player.
Button(int, int, String) - Constructor for class Button
Constructs a button with an image.
ButtonManager - Class in Unnamed Package
The ButtonManager class manages the buttons and controls within the Pong game environment.
ButtonManager(int, int, Pong) - Constructor for class ButtonManager
Constructs a ButtonManager for the Pong game.
